verbs.description: [ARG1: Trump] [V: is] [ARG2: untroubled by this question] [ARGM-CAU: because democracy and constitutional order , to the extent he understands them , do not seem to be what he has in mind] .
Trump is untroubled by this question because democracy and constitutional order , to [ARGM-EXT: the extent] [ARG0: he] [V: understands] [ARG1: them] , do not seem to be what he has in mind .
Trump is untroubled by this question because democracy and constitutional order , to the extent he understands them , [V: do] not seem to be what he has in mind .

Trump is untroubled by this question because [ARG1: democracy and constitutional order] , [ARGM-ADV: to the extent he understands them] , do [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: seem] [C-ARG1: to be what he has in mind] .
Trump is untroubled by this question because [ARG1: democracy and constitutional order] , to the extent he understands them , do not seem to [V: be] [ARG2: what he has in mind] .
Trump is untroubled by this question because democracy and constitutional order , to the extent he understands them , do not seem to be [ARG1: what] [ARG0: he] [V: has] [ARGM-ADV: in mind] .
